Bootstrap.Button.name: Bootstrap.Button

classitems.description: Default label of the button. Not need if used as a block component
classitems.name: defaultText

classitems.description: Set the type of the button, either 'button' or 'submit'
classitems.name: buttonType

classitems.description: Set the 'active' class to apply active/pressed CSS styling
classitems.name: active

classitems.description:
Property for block level buttons

See the [Bootstrap docs](http://getbootstrap.com/css/#buttons-sizes)
classitems.name: block

classitems.description: If toggle property is true, clicking the button will toggle the active state
classitems.name: toggle

classitems.description: If button is active and this is set, the icon property will match this property
classitems.name: iconActive

classitems.description: If button is inactive and this is set, the icon property will match this property
classitems.name: iconInactive

classitems.description: Class(es) (e.g. glyphicons or font awesome) to use as a button icon This will render a element in front of the button's label
classitems.name: icon

classitems.description:
Supply a value that will be associated with this button. This will be send
as a parameter of the default action triggered when clicking the button
classitems.name: value

classitems.description:
State of the button. The button's label (if not used as a block component) will be set to the
`<state>Text` property.
This property will automatically be set when using a click action that supplies the callback with an promise
classitems.name: textState

classitems.description: Set this to true to reset the state. A typical use case is to bind this attribute with ember-data isDirty flag.
classitems.name: reset

classitems.description: This will reset the state property to 'default', and with that the button's label to defaultText
classitems.name: resetState

classitems.description:
Click handler. This will send the default "action" action, with the following parameters:
* value of the button (that is the value of the "value" property)
* original event object of the click event
* callback: call that with a promise object, and the buttons state will automatically set to "pending", "resolved" and/or "rejected"
classitems.name: click

classitems.description:
Property for size styling, set to 'lg', 'sm' or 'xs'

Also see the [Bootstrap docs](http://getbootstrap.com/css/#buttons-sizes)
classitems.name: size

classitems.description:
Property for type styling

For the available types see the [Bootstrap docs](http://getbootstrap.com/css/#buttons-options) (use without "btn-" prefix)
classitems.name: type
